derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin sartor 'tailor' (from sarcire 'to patch') + -ial

entry.tran: 服装的;裁缝的;缝纫的;衣着的
entry.def: Sartorial means relating to clothes and to the way they are made or worn.

example.tran: 塞巴斯蒂安精致考究的穿着

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the sartorius muscle
2. of or relating to a tailor or to tailoring
